{"blocks":[{"key":"87o37","text":"Spatial coverage and environment(s) of relevance\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3f8pi","text":"If applicable, please specify the region where the protocol is applied. For regional term guidance see here. If applicable, please indicate here the environment(s) of relevance for the protocol, e.g. Abyssal plain. Select from the ENVO terminology.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a71i2","text":"https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/envo","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":41}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BC19492BDD504839A135BE7FDCCE12C2","url":"https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/envo"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"denhv","text":"Personnel Required\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75gad","text":"Insert the number of technicians, data managers, and scientists required for the good execution of the procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24l4l","text":"Safety\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1d9un","text":"Identify hazards associated with the procedure and specify protective equipment and safety training required to safely execute the procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gce7","text":"Training requirements\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f96u6","text":"Specify technical training required for the good execution of the procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brb83","text":"Time needed to execute the procedure\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5he3m","text":"Specify how much time is necessary to execute the procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

DESCRIPTION e.g. filter
PRODUCT NAME AND MODEL Provide the official name of the product
MANUFACTURER Provide the name of the manufacturer of the product.
QUANTITY Provide quantities necessary for one application of the standard operating procedure (e.g. number of filters).
REMARK For example, some of the consumable may need to be sterilized, some commercial solution may need to be diluted or shielded from light during the operating procedure.

{"blocks":[{"key":"2u98k","text":"In the following SOP, please use the exact names of equipment as noted in the table above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61aqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2012h","text":"Provide a step-by-step description of the protocol. The identification of difficult steps in the protocol and the provision of recommendations for the execution of those steps are encouraged.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1i8bc","text":"Please specify the preparatory actions you took before you collected the samples and note what equipment was needed to do so (e.g. disinfection of work surfaces, preparations to the equipment you intend to use later on).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tbkp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb6tq","text":"Step","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f05l4","text":"Please specify the actions you took to amplify the previously extracted DNA and the equipment and primers you used (ingredients for the PCR reaction, number of triplicates, PCR cycle parameter)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clu1b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cudbi","text":"Primers: PCR primer name, direction, and sequence","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bl0i","text":"  
PCR Primer Name
Direction
Sequence (5’ -> 3’)
   
content
forward
content
 
content
reverse
content
  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":105}],"data":{}},{"key":"eqpmq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9v1if","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"822st","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":""},"colTitles":["PCR Primer Name","Direction","Sequence (5’ -> 3’)"],"colWidths":["142","104","171"],"data":[["content","forward","content"],["content","reverse","content"]],"guid":"0EB86ED2C52740CF832C0D06DE0853CD","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["content","forward","content"],["content","reverse","content"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eb7qn","text":"Please specify the actions you took to confirm the quality of the PCR output, to clean up the PCR output and the equipment you used (e.g. agarose gel to confirm quality, purification of PCR products).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bh4a","text":"Describe and explain criteria used to validate results of the standard operating procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h5c0","text":"Identify known issues associated with the procedure, if any.\n\nProvide troubleshooting guidelines when available.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6j67o","text":"Insert all references cited in the document.\n\nPlease insert full DOI address when available, e.g. http://doi.dx.org/10.1007/s11258-014-0404-1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj874","text":"Link templates (e.g. preformatted spreadsheets) used to record measurements and report on the quality of the data as well as any documents such as manufacturer specifications, images, etc that support this protocol. Please include a short note describing the document’s relevance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
